title: Interpret Airborne Geophysical Survey
description: A geophysicist interprets data from an airborne magnetic survey to identify geological structures that might host mineralization.

tasks.description: Import and process the raw magnetic data from the airborne survey.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clean, processed magnetic map of the survey area is created.

tasks.description: Analyze the magnetic map to identify linear features that could represent faults or dykes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Major structural features are interpreted from the data.

tasks.description: Integrate the interpretation with the known geology to generate new exploration targets where favorable structures intersect prospective rock types.
tasks.expected_outcome: A set of new exploration targets is generated and prioritized for follow-up.
